root: ^Ok, so Mario Maker 2 is my favorite game.
^But it seems like in Secret Game mario maker has unfortunate past
^Do you think there's something wrong with this?

Continuing: ^This game is going to be about Miku!!! that's Miku's EXACT color pallete I just looked it up!!
^Ok there's gonna be a quiz really soon..
^Also just a reminder to parse the color coding out of the incremental text displaying just skip over
^hashtags need escape characters, escape characters probably need escape characters but don't have to worry abt that rn

c-1: ^ You were close but you accidentally scrambled the letters

Kumi: ^This is a followup to you picking Kumi on the quiz.
Miku: ^This is a followup to you picking Miku on the quiz.
